{{Location Intro|description=<p>{{If Self|Apam Woods|It|Apam Woods}} is a massive rainforest with trees that stretch towards the sky. After completing the World Quest ''[[A Prayer for Rain on the Fecund Land]]'', the player will be able to operate the [[Varuna Contraption]] and control the rain.</p>}}

==Features==
===Exploration===
* [[Varuna Contraption]]:
** Between 00:00 – 06:00 and between 12:00 – 18:00 (late day/late night), this area will always have rain, and the water level will be lowered.
** Between 06:00 – 12:00 and between 18:00 – 00:00 (early day/early night), this area will never have rain, and the water level will rise, rendering the lower area inaccessible.
* [[Poisonous Mushroom]]

==Descriptions==
{{Description|The Varuna Contraption shows forth its power, bringing forth the water of life and turning Valuka into Vana, turning the barren lands into a land full of life.|Viewpoint, [[Varunastra]]}}
{{Description|The forest of a rain without end.<br>The towering trees reach for the sky freely. Perhaps one day its branches will touch the stars. But under their canopy, the rain has never ceased.|[https://genshin.hoyoverse.com/en/map Exploration], Genshin Impact Official Site}}

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* {{Lang|{{w|Ap (water)|''Apam''}}|sa=अप्}} in Sanskrit means "of the waters." {{w|Apām Napāt|''Apam Napat''}} is an Indo-Iranian deity associated with water. Napat means "grandson" or "progeny." In Sanskrit and Avestan, Apam Napat means ''Child of the Waters''.
